Params: {3: "She no longer remembers how long that day's battle lasted."}
{3: 'Raising her cannon, swinging her sword, countless particles of light scattered.'}
{3: 'Shouts, roars, and wails pierced her eyes like needles.'}
{3: 'Wielding an unquenchable blue flame, she surveys anyone trying to approach her.'}
{3: 'She sees her figure reflected in their pupils, witnessing two starkly different emotions.'}
{3: 'Black figures emerge endlessly from the horizon; for every one that falls, ten more charge forward.'}
{3: 'Like moths spiraling in the dark, drawn to a glimmer of light, they converge here.'}
{3: "She doesn't understand the meaning behind all of this."}
{1: '1', 3: 'A momentary lag appears in her tireless body, and her sword is knocked away.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ending it all now wouldn't be so bad—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her thoughts overlap with the incoming sword tip.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She sees a flash of green light.'}
{3: 'A girl wielding a scythe cuts down the sword aimed at her in a single swing.'}
{3: 'Without a word, she picks up the sword that fell to the side, standing beside the girl who suddenly appeared.'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Where is this...? Never mind, it doesn't matter."}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'You disappeared without a word, and my heart nearly broke.'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: "No... I'm not quite sure myself..."}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Anyway, let's take out these nuisances first."}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Your journey can't end here. I won't allow you to be defeated by anyone other than me."}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'We are destined to be entwined forever, our "conflict" will never end.'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'What can our battles bring about...'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "At least, they brought us to this moment, didn't they?"}
{3: 'Back to back, the two stand, their weapons reflecting hostility from all directions.'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: '...Then, stay with me for a while.'}
{3: 'The lengthy battle finally ends. Although it was just a replay of past memories, it still took a toll on her body and spirit.'}
{3: 'She tries to step forward, but her body involuntarily shakes and she half-kneels down.'}
{3: 'Taking on alone the enemies she had once fought with DEAD MASTER nearly sapped her of all her energy.'}
{3: 'As a reward for completing the event, a golden dice falls in front of her.'}
{3: 'Instead of numbers, it bears tiny cross symbols.'}
{3: 'She reaches out to grab it, but the dice vanishes immediately.'}
{3: "She doesn't have time to dwell on it, as she hears footsteps coming from behind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Tada! I've caught up to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'Nothing... Just reminiscing about the past.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'A red glow spreads from beneath their feet, turning the grid into a battlefield for two chess pieces.'}
{3: 'With the fall of the last Mental Image, the wilderness returns to silence.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Alright, now there's no one to disturb us.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'Raise your weapon, BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER. The grievances from you leaving without saying goodbye during our last encounter, the one before that, and even the one before that... Today, I intend to settle them all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: '...Before we start, I have a question.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'What exactly are we to each other?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "That's... Eh? Um, wait, if you're asking me to define it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'Of course, more than friends, we\'re "best friends," aren\'t we?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'Yes, why else would we keep fighting?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "It sounds strange hearing you say it, but isn't that the case?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "What's the matter, asking this now of all times?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'No, just using the time to chat to regain some strength.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'When did you become so cunning?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Nostalgia aside, I won't let you outsmart me this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: "You're better at that sort of thing, actually.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Anyway, you can't defeat me now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: '...How about we pause for ten minutes?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The black scythe slices through the air toward her. She tries to block with her sword but is sent flying by a skillfully applied force.'}
{3: 'She raises her cannon, charging up energy, only for DEAD MASTER to eerily close in, her scythe locking onto her throat.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The scythe falls, and the blue flame slowly extinguishes.'}
{3: 'She watches her last dice fly toward DEAD MASTER.'}
{3: 'White light begins to radiate from her, as she feels herself slowly disintegrating.'}
{3: 'This signifies her defeat in the game, signaling her exit.'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: "No, it's not over. It will never be over, DEAD MASTER.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The green-eyed girl murmurs softly, gazing at the reflection of the castle.'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "You wouldn't just let it end like this, would you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She walks to the final destination, pushing open the grand door.'}
